author: wtopstaff
title: Hawks-Pelicans, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 9, 2015 10:06 pm ATLANTA (103) 
Bazemore 2-3 6-7 10, Millsap 4-12 0-0 9, Horford 4-9 0-0 10, Teague 1-5 2-2 4, Korver 2-6 5-5 10, Splitter 3-3 3-6 9, Schroder 3-8 4-4 11, Hardaway Jr. 2-4 1-2 7, Muscala 2-3 1-2 6, Scott 3-7 2-2 9, Ju.Holiday 0-4 0-0 0, Tavares 3-5 2-6 8, Mack 1-2 0-0 2, Petteway 1-1 0-0 2, Patterson 2-2 0-0 6, Barron 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 33-74 26-36 103. NEW ORLEANS (93) 
Cunningham 0-4 3-4 3, Davis 8-15 2-4 20, Perkins 0-2 0-0 0, Jr.Holiday 2-5 3-3 7, Gordon 1-4 0-0 2, Anderson 0-4 1-2 1, Evans 8-15 0-0 17, Babbitt 2-6 2-3 8, Cole 1-8 2-2 4, Gee 3-5 2-2 9, Douglas-Roberts 1-2 4-4 6, Adrien 0-0 2-6 2, Dejean-Jones 3-6 0-0 6, Webster 1-4 0-0 2, Kilpatrick 2-4 1-1 6. Totals 32-84 22-31 93. Atlanta 15 27 30 31—103 New Orleans 23 26 21 23— 93 
3-Point Goals_Atlanta 11-26 (Patterson 2-2, Hardaway Jr. 2-3, Horford 2-3, Schroder 1-1, Muscala 1-1, Millsap 1-3, Scott 1-3, Korver 1-5, Mack 0-1, Ju.Holiday 0-2, Teague 0-2), New Orleans 7-27 (Davis 2-3, Babbitt 2-4, Gee 1-1, Kilpatrick 1-2, Evans 1-3, Perkins 0-1, Cunningham 0-2, Jr.Holiday 0-2, Gordon 0-3, Anderson 0-3, Cole 0-3). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_Atlanta 57 (Millsap 8), New Orleans 55 (Evans 9). Assists_Atlanta 21 (Teague, Patterson 3), New Orleans 15 (Cole 3). Total Fouls_Atlanta 23, New Orleans 26. Technicals_Millsap, Schroder, Atlanta defensive three second 2, Davis. A_7,628 (16,000). Topics:
